mapper.sql: select id, product_id, picture, `describe`, price, product_sn, attachments, create_time, create_by, create_by_id, update_time, update_by, update_by_id from we_product
mapper.select:
select wp.id, wp.product_id, wp.picture, wp.`describe`, wp.price, wp.product_sn, wp.attachments, wp.create_by, wp.update_time, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM we_product_order o WHERE o.product_id = wp.id ) AS order_num, COALESCE(( SELECT sum(total_fee) FROM we_product_order po WHERE po.product_id = wp.id ),0) AS order_total_amount from we_product wp
and wp.`describe` like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
AND date_format(wp.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
AND date_format(wp.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
and wp.del_flag = 0
order by wp.update_time desc

SELECT count(1) AS orderNum, COALESCE(sum(o.total_fee), 0) AS orderFee, COALESCE((SELECT sum(r.refund_fee) FROM we_product_order_refund r WHERE r.order_no = o.order_no and refund_state = 2), 0) AS refundFee FROM we_product_order o WHERE o.product_id = #{productId} AND o.del_flag = 0
